title: SOLD: T206 McGraw w/Red Hindu SGC AUT
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 McGraw w/Red Hindu SGC AUT
posts.post_content:
The following card is available for sale:

1) T206 John McGraw (glove at hip) w/Red Hindu back SGC AUTH.  Rough looking card with plenty of damage, including paper loss on the back.  Still a very tough back and a good filler until you find a better one.  Plus it's a HOFer!  

Price: CARD IS SOLD (includes shipping)

First to email me with intent to purchase gets the card.

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Payment accepted: Check, MO, or paypal as a gift

Thanks for looking.

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/My%2015/1909-11T-206McGrawJohnGoveatHipREDH.jpg[/IMG]
Ugh...that's tempting.  I have to pass on it, but it'll make a nice filler in someone's collection!
